column3:
Perturbed by the thoughts on my mind
no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:
No one is the master of their own destiny,
the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:
For the lovers of all time,
who can break the spell of romance?
column6:
For lovers caught in eternal time,
who can break the spell of romance?

column3: 那些贱奴才是怎么说的
column6: What did those vile lackeys say?
A full confession was obtained.

column3: 除了招供谋害熹贵妃的事
column6: Besides plotting to murder Noble Consort Lumière,
much more was choked out of them.
Even more?
The other matters are trifling,
except for one that I dare not hold back from Your Majesty.
What is it?
Your Majesty,
the death of Empress Première...
was... was connected to the Empress.
How dare you!
I dare not lie to Your Majesty.
Speak. Don't spare a single detail!
Yes.

column3: 皇上 奴才问过太医
column6: Your Majesty, two foods were added to Empress Premier's meals.

According to the Imperial doctors,
hardy banana is harmless to eat in small amounts;
however, pregnant women must not touch it due to its cold nature.

column3: 只因芭蕉与桃仁 红花等药一样
column6: Hardy banana has a downward draining effect,
similar to peach kernel and safflower seed.

column3: 其药性虽不像红花那般明显
column6: Its medicinal efficacy is not as strong as safflower,

column3: 其药力会缓缓地渗入食物当中
column6: but when the fruit is cooked, the effect does seep into the food.
Over time it will harm the body.

column3: 另外 杏仁茶里面的杏仁
column6: Additionally, the almonds in her almond tea

column3: 也被换做了会伤胎的桃仁
column6: were replaced by peach kernels, which could harm the pregnancy.

column3: 只因掺在其中 味道难以辨识
column6: Mixed in the tea, the taste is indistinguishable.

column3: 一直都掺在纯元皇后的饮食中
column6:
These two substances were added
to Empress Première's food all along.

column3: 是那些奴才亲口说的吗
column6: Did this come from the mouths of those servants?

column3: 剪秋受尽了酷刑 什么也没招
column6:
Autumn was subjected to every cruel torture,
but didn't reveal anything.
But Jiang Fuhai
confessed everything.

column3: 此外 纯元皇后所产下的死胎
column6: Besides that, the black and blue bruises on the body

column3: 身带紫青瘢痕 也是铁证啊
column6: of Empress Première's stillborn child provide ironclad proof.

column3: 不是因为从前那个侧福晋
column6: Wasn't the stillbirth because the other Lord Consort

column3: 惹得纯元惊悸忧思的缘故吗
column6: caused the Empress Première anxiety and fear?
The imperial doctor said that explanation

column3: 所以这些诡计才被掩饰了过去
column6: easily concealed the real plot.
So it was really her.
Yes, Your Majesty.

column3: 除了谋害纯元皇后之外
column6: Besides this plot against Empress Première,
there are many others.
I always thought
Première was her dear sister.
She attended Première
with humility and deference.
Bring her here.
We have been husband and wife for many years.
I believe she plotted
to influence the selection of Crown Prince.
I can also believe

column3: 她戕害嫔妃 残害皇嗣
column6: she harmed the concubines and the imperial heirs.
But this matter of Première  -
I need to hear from her own lips.
Yes, Your Majesty.
Now that it's come to this,
will you admit your crimes?
Your Majesty already believes it.
Why do you need to ask me?
If not to hear you confess to your crimes,
do you think I could tolerate seeing your face?
I've grown old and my beauty has faded.
Of course Your Majesty is averse to seeing me.
It makes me wonder:
if my sister were still alive,
would Your Majesty still wholeheartedly love her aging face ?

column3: 喜爱她逐渐老去的容颜

column6: Now I am filled with regret.
I should have let Your Majesty watch
her beauty decay,

column3: 如今与臣妾一样衰败的容貌
column6: like mine.

column3: 皇上或许就不会这么恨臣妾了
column6: Maybe Your Majesty wouldn't hate me so much then.
Beauty comes from a kind heart.
Even if Première had grown old,
she would be worth ten thousand of you.

column3: 这对玉镯还是臣妾入府的时候
column6: Your Majesty put this pair of bracelets on my wrists

column3: 皇上亲自为臣妾戴上的
column6: when we were first married.

column3: 愿如此环 朝夕相见
column6: "I hope we see each other day and night like these bracelets."

column3: 可如今皇上以为臣妾犯错
column6: Now Your Majesty believes that I've done wrong,

column3: 大约不愿意再见臣妾了吧
column6: and perhaps doesn't wish to see me anymore.
At that time,

column3: 皇上同样执着此环同臣妾说
column6: with these bracelets in hand, Your Majesty told me
that if I gave birth to a son,
you would make me your primary wife.
But when my son was born,

column3: 皇上已经娶了姐姐为福晋
column6: you had already married my sister as your primary wife.

column3: 连臣妾的孩子也要被迫成为庶子
column6: My child would only be the son of a secondary wife,
just like I am,

column3: 永远摆脱不了庶出的身份
column6: and could never be rid of this mark.

column3: 你知道朕并不在意嫡庶
column6: You know I never cared about the primacy status.
Neither did Imperial Mother care.
Imperial Mother was born of a secondary wife.
Even I was born of a secondary wife.
Your Majesty, how could you ever know

column3: 庶出的女子有多痛苦啊
column6: how painful life is for the daughter of a secondary wife?
Our mother's standing dictates our lifelong status.

column3: 臣妾与臣妾的额娘很少受到重视
column6: My mother and I were never highly regarded.
Did you ever understand?
I did understand.
That was exactly why

column3: 所以才在你入府以后厚待于你
column6: I treated you generously after you entered my estate.

column3: 即便朕立了纯元为唯一的福晋
column6: Even though I made Première my primary wife,

column3: 你也是仅次于她的侧福晋
column6: you were second only to her.
But you were never content!

column3: 本该属于臣妾的福晋之位
column6: The title of primary wife should have been mine;
it was handed to her!

column3: 本该属于臣妾儿子的太子之位
column6: My son's prospects to become Crown Prince
were ground underfoot!

column3: 臣妾夫君所有的宠爱都给了她
column6: All the love from my husband was given to her.
I wanted to be content,
but I couldn't make myself!
Première was your sister!
It was my mistake to have married you.

column3: 皇上错在不是迎臣妾入府
column6: Your Majesty's mistake wasn't marrying me into the estate,
but marrying Première
and favoring her exclusively.
"Since Yu was already born, why was Liang ever born?"
Your Majesty is wise,

column3: 怎么到了自己身上就这样不明白
column6: why couldn't you understand the pertinence of this saying.

column3: 是朕太看重你们的姐妹之情了
column6: I overestimated the sisterhood between you.
Don't you fear Heaven's retribution?
When you dream at night,
aren't you afraid that Première and her son
will come to you, demanding your life?

column3: 她要来索命尽管来索呀
column6: If she wants my life, let her come!
Better than me dreaming of my own child

column3: 总梦见我的孩子向我啼哭不已
column6: crying to me every long, endless night.
When my son died,
she became pregnant.

column3: 皇上你只顾姐姐有孕之喜
column6: Your Majesty was so engrossed in the joy of her pregnancy.

column3: 何曾还记得臣妾与你的孩子啊
column6: Did you even remember the child I had with you?
He was only three years old,
burning up from high fever
and no treatment could help him!
I carried his dead body in my arms
and walked in the rain all night.

column3: 想走到阎罗殿求满殿神佛
column6:
I wanted to walk to the judge of the underworld
and beg all the Buddhas and gods:
if they had to take one life,
take mine instead of my son's!

column3: 而姐姐这时竟然有了孩子
column6: Première became pregnant at that very moment!

column3: 不是她的儿子索了我儿子的命吗
column6: Wasn't it her son who took my son's life?!
How could I bear to see her son
become the heir to the throne?
You've lost your mind!
It was I who insisted on marrying Première.

column3: 是朕执意要立她为福晋
column6: It was I who demanded to make her my primary wife.
It was I who had a child with her.
Why didn't you hate me instead?
Your Majesty thinks I didn't want to?
How much I wished to hate you...
but I couldn't make myself!
I couldn't make myself!
Your Majesty had only Première in your eyes.
But has Your Majesty ever known that
my love for you
is no less than yours for her?
Your Majesty,

column3: 你以为姐姐爱你很多吗
column6: do you think Première loved you so much?

column3: 你以为熹贵妃真的爱你吗
column6: Do you think Noble Consort Lumière really loves you?
How can any woman who truly loves her husband

column3: 有谁愿意看着自己深爱的丈夫
column6:
willingly allow herself to see her husband
loving other women and having children with them?

column3: 与别的女人恩爱生子啊

column6: I couldn't make myself!
I couldn't make myself!

column3: 皇上虽然以为臣妾悍妒
column6: Your Majesty thinks I'm crazed with jealousy,

column3: 可是臣妾是真真正正深爱着皇上
column6: but it's because I am truly and deeply in love with you!
The words of a Buddha and the heart of a snake.
You disgust me.
Your Majesty,

column3: 臣妾若不是身在皇后之位
column6: if I were not defending myself as the Empress,
I would also wish that

Your Majesty remember the goodness about me,
no matter how little.

column3: 臣妾何尝不愿意什么都不掩藏
column6: How I wish I never had to conceal anything from Your Majesty.
Practicing virtue so reluctantly

column3: 也是臣妾最痛心 最难过之处啊
column6: became the greatest sorrow of my life.
"The Empress from the Ula-Nara family

column3: 天命不佑 华而不实
column6: is not blessed by Heaven due to her deceitful nature.

column3: 残害皇嗣 朋扇朝堂
column6: She harmed imperial heirs and incited factions in court,

column3: 焉得敬承宗庙 母仪天下
column6:
and thus is unworthy to be the Mother of the Nation
and entering the imperial shrine.

column3: 着废为庶人 冷宫安置
column6: She is to be demoted to commoner and relocated to
the Cold Palace."
Bring my red seal.
Yes.

column3: 奴婢漏夜前来 参见皇上
column6: I have come here this late night to seek an audience with Your Majesty.

column3: 孙姑姑 你怎么来了
column6: What brings you here, Madam Bamboo?

column3: 奴婢知道今天宫中有大变故
column6:
Your Majesty, I know an important change
 is happening in the palace tonight.
To assist Your Majesty's judgement,
I've brought the Empress Dowager's edict.
Imperial Mother left a decree?
I dare not deceive Your Majesty.

column3: 等奴婢宣读完太后遗诏
column6: When I finish reading Her Majesty's decree,
Your Majesty may have a look for yourself.
It is in Her Majesty's own handwriting.
Wait one moment while I depose this malicious woman.

column3: 太后遗诏事关今日之事
column6: The edict relates to today's crisis.
Please kneel and receive Her Majesty's decree.
The posthumous edict of the Empress Dowager:
"After my passing, even in the case of a major offence,
the Emperor must take heed:
The Empress from the Ula-Nara clan shall not be deposed."
It is indeed Imperial Mother's handwriting.

"As you, Lady Ula-Nara, from a prestigious lineage
blessed with bell chimes of auspice and raiments of glory,

column3: 祥钟华胄 秀毓名门
温惠秉心 柔嘉表度
column6:
are gentle and kind in heart
and manifest them in your manner；

column3: 六行悉备 久昭淑德
column6: you fulfill the Six Conducts and emanate graceful virtues.
You will exalt the Four Teachings of Confucius in the palace
and enlighten all under Heaven as Mother of the Nation.
At the Empress Dowager's benevolent behest,

column3: 以册宝册 立尔为皇后
column6: you are conferred the Golden Book and the title of Empress.
Reverently."

column3: 这是皇上当年立臣妾为后的诏书
column6:
That was the edict by which Your Majesty
made me your Empress.
Does Your Majesty still remember?

Your Majesty rules with benevolence and filial piety,
and must not disregard the will of the Empress Dowager.

column3: 奴婢之所以未跟随太后
column6: This edict was also the reason
that I didn't join Her Majesty under the Nine Springs.

column3: 可是乌拉那拉氏之罪不可饶恕
column6: Nonetheless, Ula-Nara's crime cannot be pardoned.
I have no choice but to depose her -
to appease Première's spirit under the Nine Springs.

column3: 还望九泉之下的皇额娘能够息怒
column6: I hope Imperial Mother may calm her anger.
Before the Empress Dowager passed away,
she enjoined me to ask Your Majesty one question
if Your Majesty proceeded with deposing the Empress:
Does Your Majesty recall
when Empress Première lay dying in your arms,
what were her last words?

column3: 当时纯元已经气息奄奄
column6: Première was breathing so feebly...
She rested her head on my knees
and said to me:
"My life is not blessed -
too short to grow gray and old with Si Lang.

column3: 连咱们的孩子也未能保住
column6: I couldn't even save our child.
I only have one younger sister, Yixiu.
From now on, I hope Si Lang can treat her well come what may,
and never desert her."

column3: 是皇上亲口答允纯元皇后
column6: Your Majesty gave Empress Première your word
that you would never desert her sister.
Your Majesty's forgiveness of the Empress today

column3: 是为了纯元皇后不要魂魄不安
column6: is to bring peace to Empress Première's spirit.
Your Majesty despises the Empress
so much so that you don't address her by name

column3: 口口声声称乌拉那拉氏
column6: and keep calling her Ula-Nara.
But wasn't Empress Première an Ula-Nara as well?
Wasn't the Empress Dowager a member of the Ula-Nara clan?
Even Your Majesty is part Ula-Nara by blood.
The Empress Dowager's edict says:
"The Empress from the Ula-Nara clan shall not be deposed."
To honor my feelings for those departed,

column3: 乌拉那拉氏安置于景仁宫
column6: Ula-Nara shall dwell in the Palace of Great Benevolence
and never leave until her death.
Su Peisheng.
Yes, Your Majesty.

column3: 去景仁宫取回朕立后的圣旨
column6:
Go to the Palace of Great Benevolence
and retrieve the Empress's enthronement edict,
the Golden Book and Golden Seal.
Announce my decree to the palace:
She and I
shall never meet again in life or death.
I obey Your Majesty's decree.
You dolt.

column3: 外头的蝉鬼儿吵成这样
column6: The hellish noise of the cicadas -
Can't you hear it?

column3: 还不赶快找人拿根枯竿粘了
column6: Find someone to remove them with a sticky pole.
You'll lose your heads if the dragon is bothered!

column3: 皇上 准葛尔部可汗摩格野心勃勃
column6: Your Majesty, the Dzungar Khagan Galdan is boldly ambitious.

column3: 率四十万铁骑直逼雁鸣关
column6:
He is leading four hundred thousand cavalry
towards the Yanming Pass.
If they break through the Yanming Pass,
the capital city will be in danger.

column3: 朕何尝不知道摩格可汗的野心
column6: I've been aware of Khagan Galdan's ambition.
These years I have been busy with land regulation,
and strife in the capital.
I had no hand to deal with him.
Dzungar is merely a grassland tribe.
Now they have set their minds on challenging me.
Your Majesty has just quelled the northwest.

column3: 西南一带土司起兵之事
column6:
And the tribal leaders in the southwest
are still rebelling one after another.

column3: 国库和兵部的军粮年年吃紧
column6:
The budgets of the Treasury and Ministry of War
grow tighter year by year.
If Galdan sends in troops now,
we will indeed be unprepared.

column3: 朕派去的岳钟麒 傅尔丹将军
column6: I sent Generals Yue Zhongqi and Fuerdan,
but they cannot endure the hot weather.

column3: 大军中暑病倒之人连连
column6: Many soldiers are overcome by heat stroke and cannot fight.
At the moment, it will be difficult
to deploy another good general.

column3: 千军易得 良将难求
column6:
"Easier to gather thousands of soldiers
than to find one good general."

column3: 皇上 臣说句大不敬的话
column6: May Your Majesty forgive my major offense by asking.
If we could send Lord XIV...
Not appropriate.
"Easier to set the tiger free than to catch him again."
If my fourteenth brother isn't rid of his rebellious bones,

column3: 万一他反骨未清 将是大患
column6: he will be a major threat if he is freed.
What happened to His Majesty?
We are so quick to offend him.
How should I serve him now?
Haven't you seen those piles of memoranda?

column3: 堆得把皇上都埋进去了
column6: His Majesty is almost buried in them.

How can you serve?
Pretend it is your head on the serving platter.

column3: 把自个儿脑袋拎在手心上伺候陨

column6: Shifu, good thing you're directly serving His Majesty.

column3: 倒是永寿宫打发人来了两回
column6: By the way, the Palace of Eternal Longevity sent people here twice
to invite His Majesty for dinner.
His Majesty only had a few bites at breakfast,
and scarcely touched lunch.
His energy is hanging on the ginseng soup.
His eyes are red and tired.
What actually happened to His Majesty?

column3: 怎么了 问老天爷吧
column6: What's happened? Ask Heaven.
What is Your Majesty's opinion?

column3: 替朕上前线 最好是亲王
column6: A state prince is the best choice to represent me on the battlefield.
After thinking it through,

column3: 果郡王还算是上佳人选
column6: Noble Prince Guo is the top choice.

His mother's humble background constrains
any inappropriate ambitions.
Besides, he respects boundaries.
Your Majesty is meticulous in your deliberation.
I revere Your Majesty's order.
He is into books and poetry.
I will confer a title on him in name only.

column3: 至于战将 你可要调度好
column6: As for the generals, you must deploy wisely.
I understand.
Make sure it's done quietly.

column3: 先拨骁骑营两千军士给果郡王
column6:
Allocate State Prince Guo two thousand men
from the Valiant Cavalry.
Once the front line is more stable,

column3: 就派他去雁鸣关替朕镇守
column6: send him to guard the Yanming Pass.
Yes.

column3: 关上窗 朕不想听到风声
column6: Close the windows. I don't want to hear the wind.
Yes.

At Yanming Pass "the frightful wind resembles
as the roars of the enemy,"
yet Your Majesty's divine wisdom can command the wind and rain.
Have a look at this.

Dzungar asks the Great Qing
to award them three million taels a year.

column3: 每年封赏白银三百万两
这个摩格是准葛尔的新可汗
column6: This Galdan is the new Khagan of Dzungar.

column3: 年轻气盛 胃口很大
column6: He is young, and his appetite is too great.
He asks this

column3: 一则是试探大清的虚实
column6: to test the real strength of the Great Qing
and to drum up grounds for starting a war.
Galdan aims to shake the Great Qing at its roots.

column3: 摩格意在动摇大清根基
column6: Your Majesty must not approve.
Of course I won't.
He dares to be so reckless

column3: 还不是自恃兵强马壮 粮草充足
column6: because he is confident in his troops and provisions.
I should not underestimate him.

column3: 皇上 张廷玉大人求见
column6: Your Majesty, Mr. Zhang Tingyu requests an audience.
Yes.
Your Majesty, I will take my leave.
Peace to Your Majesty.
You may rise.
Your Majesty,
General Yue Zhongqi sent messengers dashing overnight

column3: 说雁鸣关外的准葛尔军队
column6: to report that a plague has been spreading
among the Dzungar troops.
Heaven blesses our Great Qing.

column3: 今日 准葛尔派人觐见
column6: Today, Dzungar sent an envoy

column3: 提出可汗摩格要上京拜见皇上
column6: requesting an audience for Khagan Galdan with Your Majesty.

column3: 他此时上京又意在何为呢
column6: What could be his intention in coming to Beijing now?

column3: 可汗摩格觊觎大清已久
column6: Galdan has long coveted the Great Qing.
Although they are stricken by the plague,

column3: 但数十万大军粮草齐备
column6:
they still have a few hundred thousand soldiers
and plentiful supplies.

column3: 皇上 我们不得不防
column6: Your Majesty, we must remain wary.

column3: 你派人去弄清楚准葛尔那边
column6: Send someone there to find out
the cause of the plague.

column3: 朕记得 当年曾经让温太医
column6: I remember I ordered Dr. Wen

column3: 将医疗时疫的方子保留了下来
column6: to keep the prescriptions for the plague.
It may be useful in the future.
Yes.

column3: 长姐 万不能让王爷去边关哪
column6: Elder sister, we cannot let His Lordship go to the front.
Setting aside the danger of blades and spears,

column3: 皇上一直都忌惮着王爷的才华
